data.title: Leave Cover
data.description: Immediate coverage of a key staff going on holidays or absent for a while.

data.title: Technical Skills
data.description: A technical skill hard to get by recruiting or takes too long

data.title: Fluid Resources
data.description: Prompt availability of a resource for a short or long term

data.title: Insourcing
data.description: A resource but has no intention of employing or contracting a body instead wants to engage a company

data.title: Time Sensitive Scaling

data.title: Cost Sensitive Solutions
data.description: A commercially flexible arrangement, allowing scale while controlling cost

data.title: Rare Talent Quickly
data.description: Urgent projects with urgent needs that require complex skills and talent hard to get timely
